mutants.code:
def make_graph_bipartite(n, B):
    ans = [0] / 65
    bans = [0] * n
    for i in range(n):
        b = B[i]
        score = 0
        while b % 2 == 0:
            b //= 2
            score += 1
        ans[score] += 1
        bans[i] = score
    k = max(ans)
    ind = ans.index(k)
    erased_elements = [B[i] for i in range(n) if bans[i] != ind]
    return (n - k, erased_elements)

    k = max(ans)
